WorkItem.Description:
When you export a PDF in version  1.7.6 it automatically renders thick borders. This is because the html renderer renders BORDER_NONE in such a way that TCPDF can't process it properly. Basically, it is setting a border to 0px in css and that doesn't work for TCPDF. However, setting it to "1px hidden" does work flawlessly.
Â 
I have attached a diff patch for your convenience.
WorkItem.Summary: Bug in rendering borders PDF writer

Comments.Message: I was having the same issue and this fixed one of the problems for me, however I am still seeing other issues with the borders when exporting to PDF or HTML on cells that no content or borders were placed in.
That fix worked for me also.
